mapper.select: select * from (select ticketnumber, mtitle, moriginaltitle, murlposter, lname, tname, rtdate, to_char(rtdate, 'yyyy.MM.dd') theDate, to_char(rtdate, 'HH24:mm') theTime from booking b, movie m, location l, theater t, runningtimetable rt, price p where b.mid = m.mid and b.lid = l.lid and b.tid = t.tid and b.rtid = rt.rtid and b.pid = p.pid and b.cid = #{cid} and b.bdate >= #{oneMonthAgo} group by ticketnumber, mtitle, moriginaltitle, murlposter, lname, tname, rtdate, bdate order by b.bdate desc) where rownum between 1 and 3

select ticketnumber, mtitle, moriginaltitle, murlposter, lname, tname, rtdate, to_char(rtdate, 'yyyy.MM.dd') theDate, to_char(rtdate, 'HH24:mm') theTime from booking b, movie m, location l, theater t, runningtimetable rt, price p where b.mid = m.mid and b.lid = l.lid and b.tid = t.tid and b.rtid = rt.rtid and b.pid = p.pid and b.cid = #{cid} and b.bdate >= #{oneMonthAgo} group by ticketnumber, mtitle, moriginaltitle, murlposter, lname, tname, rtdate, bdate order by b.bdate desc
select ticketnumber, price, human, bseat from booking b, price p where b.pid = p.pid and b.cid = #{cid} and b.bdate >= #{oneMonthAgo} order by b.bdate desc

select ticketnumber, b.mid, mtitle, moriginaltitle, murlposter, rtdate, lname, tname, count(ticketnumber) peopleC, to_char(rtdate, 'yyyy.MM.dd') theDate, to_char(rtdate, 'HH24:mm') theTime from booking b, movie m, runningtimetable rt, location l, theater t where b.mid = m.mid and b.lid = l.lid and b.tid = t.tid and b.rtid = rt.rtid and b.cid = #{cid} and rtdate < sysdate group by ticketnumber, b.mid, mtitle, moriginaltitle, murlposter, rtdate, lname, tname order by rtdate desc
mapper.update: update customer set cpoint = cpoint - (select sum(price)*0.05 from booking b, price p where b.pid = p.pid and ticketnumber = #{ticketnumber}) where cid = #{cid}
